pr_title: Some nullable client field docs, and other misc docs

timeline.message: Some nullable client field docs, and other misc docs

timeline.bodyText: Should say "connected to a logical server" than "in game"
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I think this is fine, this field in particular only says "currently, we're viewing THIS world". It doesn't really say anything about a server connection in my opinion. (also: isn't this field null while connected and still in the login phase?)
replies.author: shartte

timeline.bodyText: maybe just link to minecraft wiki
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -85,6 +85,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1937 net/minecraft/world/World ARG 2 entity ARG 3 direction METHOD method_27982 isDebugWorld ()Z + COMMENT Checks if this world is a debug world. + COMMENT + COMMENT

Debug worlds are not modifiable and are typically meant for development and debug use only.

replies.bodyText:
This would be the relevant link:
https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Debug_mode
replies.author: shartte

timeline.bodyText: I already mapped that in my client pr
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,6 +248,8 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_310 net/minecraft/client/MinecraftClient
 	METHOD method_24460 endMonitor (ZLnet/minecraft/class_4758;)V
 		ARG 1 active
 		ARG 2 monitor
+	METHOD method_27022 shouldGlow (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;)Z

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT

Debug worlds are not modifiable and are typically meant for development and debug use only. COMMENT

Debug worlds are not modifiable and are typically meant for development and debug use only. COMMENT See the minecraft wiki as well.
